tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_103: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'By time,',verse: 6046,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, mankind is in loss,',verse: 6047,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.',verse: 6048,},name: surah_103,};
